name: One Shot Wonder
description:
You get one bullet to hit all the targets on the screen. Take advantage of the ricochet.

Each enemy hit allows you bullet to ricochet an additional time.

Each time you loose you get set back one level.

As you play, your gun's sight will improve and show the possible trajectory of your bullet.

Note: The last two levels are quite challenging. Good luck :)

Update: Fixed an issue with the colliders but there is still an issue where sometimes the edge of a target does not register a hit. I apologize if you run into this issue. It's pretty frustrating.
